channel.title: ☆☆☆ .::░▒▓██████ Fantura - DeviousMUD CopyCat █████▓▒░::. ☆☆☆
channel.description:
[center] [i]For all of you who didnt know. DeviousMUD was the seed of runescape. It was a game which Andrew Gower(the creator of runescape) and his brothers worked on and only released it to the public for a week.[/i]
I am now recreating that kind of game.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2gumxpw.png[/img] [b]FanturaScape[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2gumxpw.png[/img]
Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?4ka0wpp476ti743
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fkcqxl.png[/img] All graphics are pixelated from scratch! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/rhnafd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://a3.sphotos.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/387322_2484054629361_1492488062_31950635_976672501_n.jpg[/img]
This private server is in 2D and has 4 directional walking.
There are 5 skills so far (not TRAINABLE yet.)
*Cooking *Fishing *Mining *Smithing *Woodcutting
Some youtube videos: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LCU82GzI_VU[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fvHuBuvZjfw[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_vy26l4MNA[/youtube]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/14jp3l1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2vd5u21.png[/img]
I forgot to mention, you can play this server while it is being developed. It has an advanced updating system that lets me update while you're playing as long as it doesnt need new graphical content.
This is made using VB6 with a base ORPG engine, major editing is being done every day. :) [/center]

item.title: ☆☆☆ .::░▒▓██████ Fantura - DeviousMUD CopyCat █████▓▒░::. ☆☆☆
item.dc:creator: @lurviq lurviq
item.description:
@lurviq wrote:

[quote=“Anfernioo, post:33, topic:433838”]Little did you guys know, graphics can get worse than Devious MUD

Brb, drawing a better game on MSPaint[/quote]

Bitch please. the graphics ARE pixelated in ms paint.
You have no idea how big the source of this is.

_apart from that

March 12 is my birthday, there will be a drop party. March 12 10PM(GMT)
Will be dropping party hats, gear, coins, IRL-Cash VIP items etc
Will be dropped at the starting point(home)

Read full topic

So many errors fixed, so many features added, better stability

So Runescape originated from this?

basically yes.

Would of never of guessed. It’s came a long way I would give it a test but it seems the link is gone.
[/quote]
Id love to test this out as well. Can someone pm me the link?

EDIT

y u no linux compatible

wait you cant play it on linux? Nvm, i dont need the link. -.-[/quote]you can you have to download winetricks, a couple of dll files, and run via wine. Do a tutorial for swiftkit on linux and it should be about the same thing. (pure assumption)
